Comment: Phenomenal representation of all veterans; however, she is an outstanding roll-model for females currently serving and all us female veterans! Helicopter pilot in GWOT, lost her legs, and became a very vocal rep for all things supporting vets as a US Senator. She may piss people off but so what??? Being quiet does not get things accomplished.   I was part of the 5-24% of the females in my career field during my USAF aircraft maintenance career and wished there had been more women in higher positions. Luckily, I served for several outstanding female maintenance group, wing, and higher command officers. Sadly, there were more misogynistic men in those positions than women. If we spoke out, we were emotional and asked to see mental health for being anxious. (Most of the time I had significant health issues they had issues diagnosing, I was given a mental health appointment for ‚Äúmalingering‚Äù‚Ä¶faking my illnesses to get out of work!)
